[object](./plugin.object.md)

## object() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function object<Ds extends Record<string, StateType>>(
  types: Ds,
  getFocusableChildren?: (
    children: {
      [K in keyof Ds]: {
        id: string
      }[]
    }
  ) => {
    id: string
  }[]
): ObjectStateType<Ds>
```

## Parameters

| Parameter            | Type                                                                              | Description                                                                              |
| -------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| types                | Ds                                                                                | The [state types](./internal__plugin-state.statetype.md) of the properties of the object |
| getFocusableChildren | (children: { \[K in keyof Ds\]: { id: string; }\[\]; }) =&gt; { id: string; }\[\] | Allows to override the default order of focusable children                               |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ObjectStateType](./plugin.objectstatetype.md)<!-- -->&lt;Ds&gt;
